item.title: HUB3: Chinabox med dybstegt kylling | Dybstegt kylling med Kinesisk stir-fry sauce med svampe, bambusskud, nudler, pak choy og crispy chili oil. | Chinabox med dybstegt tofú | Dybstegt tofu med Kinesisk stir-fry sauce med svampe, bambusskud, nudler, pak choy og crispy chili oil | | Monday | Chicken Korma | Made with coconut milk, warming spices, and chicken thighs. | Served with whole grain rice, almonds and coriander. | Daal | A spiced and aromatic stew with lentils and vegetables. | Tuesday | Pasta Bosco | Penne pasta served with a creamy, spicy tomato sauce made from Italian salsiccia sausage, fully ripe tomatoes, and cream. | Finished with sage, oregano, and Parmesan cheese. | Penne pasta served with butter beans in a creamy, spicy tomato sauce made from fully ripe tomatoes, cream, and sage. | Finished with oregano and Parmesan cheese. | Wednesday | Crispy and juicy homemade falafels in pita bread | Served with red cabbage, cucumber, tomato, lightly pickled onions with sumac and parsley, chili sauce, and crème fraîche dressing. | Cake of the Day: Banana cake with chocolate and coconut topping | Thursday | Danish Meatballs with Potato Salad | Crispy and juicy meatballs served with potato salad filled with radishes, chives, capers, fresh greens, and mayonnaise. | V egetarian | Vegetable Patties with Potato Salad | Crispy and juicy vegetable patties served with potato salad filled with radishes, chives, capers, fresh greens, and mayonnaise. | Friday | Chinabox with Deep-Fried Chicken | Deep-fried chicken with Chinese stir-fry sauce, mushrooms, bamboo shoots, noodles, pak choi, and crispy chili oil. | Chinabox with Deep-Fried Tofu | Deep-fried tofu with Chinese stir-fry sauce, mushrooms, bamboo shoots, noodles, pak choi, and crispy chili oil. | Vegetar | Vegetarian
